alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 07 at 3:47AM EDT until September 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heat indices in the mid-90s expected. * WHERE...In Maine, Central Interior Cumberland, Kennebec, androscoggin, and Interior York Counties. In New Hampshire, Belknap, Strafford, Southern Carroll, and Southern Grafton Counties. * WHEN...From Noon today to 6 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Overnight low temperatures will only fall into the upper 60s to near 70 degrees, offering little relief.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates as this has potential to persist through Friday.

area.areaDesc: Belknap; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton; Strafford
